A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not sure why everyone is attacking this film so harshly. Is it the best Star Wars movie ever made? No. Is it the worst? Of course not but it’s an enjoyable film. There are some sequences that probably could have been cut out (or rewritten) and there’s a couple things that might leave you scratching your head but the amazing second half more than makes up for it’s flaws.
